resources.string: Find Elected Representatives by Zip Code

Hi I'm Midori, thanks for downloading my app! Rep Messenger started as a personal project to overcome my own obstacles with civic engagement. By allowing me to save petitions as generalized templates that auto fill the details for emailing or tweeting, it takes the grunt work out of contacting my elected representatives over issues I care about. I'm proud to share it with anyone else who finds it useful.


This app is powered by Google's Civic Information API in partnership with the Voting Information Project.


This app also uses the Ion asynchronous networking library, created by Koushik Dutta.
